page.shortlink: api inet namespace ssl socket class start ssl session method
page.description: The INET::Socket OpenSocket method begins an SSL session with a socket that is already opened. If successful the socket remains secure until closed. If unsuccessful both sockets will be closed. After this call you should no long reference OpenSocket.

argument.name: Result_Flag
argument.description: TRUE (.T.) if the operation was successful; otherwise FALSE (.F.).

argument.name: Socket
argument.description: An INET::Socket object created with INET::Socket::Accept().
